snippet: Serena Williams must stop giving opponents head starts if she is to come anywhere near emulating last season's feat of winning three of the year's four grand slams, according to former world number one Chris Evert....
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams must stop giving opponents head starts if she is to come anywhere near emulating last season's feat of winning three of the year's four grand slams, according to former world number one Chris Evert.

headline.print_headline: Escape Artist Serena Will Struggle to Match 2015 Feats: Evert
headline.main: Escape Artist Serena Will Struggle to Match 2015 Feats: Evert
